summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5420 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 5, 1st Subdivision of Washington Park Addition, being the alley between 34th Avenue North and 36th Avenue North, from East Valley Street to East Ward Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 67682, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
